divs: sighting detailstoday my sister took me to the site in jackson, mi where she was sitting in her car between 8 pm and 9 pm on 24jan08 as she saw 2 large triangles or 1 triangle 2x in sky with corner lights and white or gray body between lights in full view from bright moon. they were ahead of her parked car beyond, through and above the tree tops. to the side of her and beyond the buildings she also saw 5-6 jets or 1 jet 5-6 times, flying very fast and low in area. all were within 1\4 mile of jackson airport. today i want to airport and determined that lady closing restaurant at 9 pm last night saw or heard nothing and there was no gossip in reataurant today. if you want to talk with my sister i will ask her to talk with you. she is not into such things but knows what she saw. kc
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Jackson
There were no other sightings in Jackson on or around January 24th 2008
